Event.name: Employment_end
Event.definition:
<def-root>This is a non-perspectivized frame representing the final stage of the Employment_scenario, in which the relationship between the <fen>Employer</fen> and the <fen>Employee</fen> comes to an end. There are two different ways in which the relation ends, represented in the Firing frame (in which the <fen>Employer</fen> is agentive) and the Quitting frame (in which the <fen>Employee</fen> is agentive).
</def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person whose employment relationship with an <fen>Employer</fen> ends.</def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person (or institution) whose employ the <fen>Employee</fen> leaves.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an employment relationship between an <fen>Employer</fen> and an <fen>Employee</fen> ends.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Employer</fen>/<fen>Employee</fen> relationship is ended. </def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition: <def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Employer</fen>/<fen>Employee</fen> relationship ceases.</def-root>
